title: Write the Equation in Standard Form
Determine Whether the Major Axis is Horizontal or Vertical
text: Since $$9<25$$ and 25 is in the $$x^2$$ term, the major axis is horizontal.

title: Find the endpoints of the major axis.
text: The endpoints will be the x-intercept. Since $$b^2=25$$ then $$b=-5or$$ $$b=5$$. The endpoint of the major axis are (-5,0), (5,0).

title: Find the endpoints of the minor axis.
text: The endpoints will be the y-intercepts. Since $$a^2=9$$, then $$a=-3$$ or $$a=3$$. The endpoints of the minor axis are (0,3), (0,-3).

title: Elimination of Choices
text: The graph with x-intercepts (-5,0), (5,0) and y-intercepts (0,3), (0,-3) is the answer.
